```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

### What to do for Week 7 after class ends^[For grading.]

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "
#4682b4"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "
#4682b4"))

wk_post <- tibble(

"eCampus?" = c(checked,
               checked),

Description = c("Submit the Data portion of the first exam.",
               "Submit the Paper portion of the first exam."),

Location = c("[Link](https://ecampus.wvu.edu/){target='_blank'}",
             "[Link](https://ecampus.wvu.edu/){target='_blank'}"
             )

)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'clc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "30em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "10em")
```

### What to do for Week 8 before coming to class^[For preparation.]

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
test <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("file-alt", fill = "
#4682b4"))

lightbulb <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("lightbulb", fill = "
#4682b4"))

wk_pre <- tibble(

  Area = c(test, 
         lightbulb),

Description = c("Being reviewing Chapters 1-6 and material on Data Camp/Walkthroughs for the exam.",
               "Watch videos on the differences between Bayesian and Frequentist Statistics.^[Optional but recommended.]"),

Location = c("Everywhere", 
             "[Link](/example/07-example/#crash-course-statistics-1)")

)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}

```
